defs: the art and science of music and dance, considered as one of the four auxiliary Vedas.

the third of the seven notes in an octave of Karnāṭaka and Hindustāni music systems, approximately corresponding to the 'E' of C Major.

the horse-like perissodactylous mammal, Equus heminous of Equidae family, having long ears and a short mane, either domesticated or wild; an ass; ಗಾರ್ದಭ ಗಾನ gārdabha gāna (sarc.) a singing that is unpleasant or grating to the ear; singing like a bird called swine.
one of the three sacred fires perpetually maintained by a householder, which he receives from his father and transmits to his descendants, and from which fires for sacrificial purpose are lighted.
the order or stage of life, the state or position, of a householder.
the domestic affairs of a person.
the act of flowing; a flow.
the act of a liquid that is dropping, oozing or leaking out.
the act of filtering a liquid, to separate solid contents from it.
the tree Symplocos racemosa of Symplocaceae family.
name of a Vedic sage.
one who walks fast.
one who walks relatively more.
one who roams aimlessly.
a solid or partly solid disk or a circular frame connected by spokes to a central hub, capable of turning on a central axis and used as to move vehicles or transmit power in machinery; a wheel.
a mobile chair mounted on large wheels, for persons unable to walk; a wheel-chair.
purified; filtered; sifted.
any of a series of teeth on the rim of a wheel, for transmitting or receiving motion by fitting between the teeth of another wheel; gear tooth; a cog.
a round, disk-like ornament for the ears.
the ruddy goose, the male and female of which are supposed to be together always.
to separate solid contents from a liquid by filtering; to filter.
a small variegated carpet of woollen with patterns of flowers etc. are woven on.
= ಗಾಲೀಚ.
lacking refinement, culture or elegance; uncouth, boorish, coarse, vulgar, etc.
morally bad or wrong; acting with evil intent; depraved; iniquitous; wicked.
that which lack elegance, smoothness.
the quality of being so; roughness.
a useless or unimportant man.
want of order, arrangement, system, etc.; disorderliness.
the act of hurrying carelessly or recklessly.
an instance of cheating or being cheated.
= ಗಾಲುಮೇಲು.
a more or less concentrated group of houses, larger than a village but smaller than a city; a town.
the chief of a village.
the duty, office or status of the chief of a village.
a corner, outskirt of a town or village.
= ಗಾವಠಾಣ.
(dial.) made in, coming from, belonging to a village or countryside.
owned, funded, managed by an individual, group of individuals, a company etc. independent of government's help, investment or control; belonging to private ownership; private.
the quality of being rustic, i.e. lack of refinement, elegance, polish or sophistication.
that which is made, grown in one's country (not imported).
a kind of tree.
the area in and around a town that comes under the jurisdiction of that town administration.
= ಗಾವಟೆ.
something that covers or protects; protection or place affording protection, as from the sun or elements or danger.
= ಗಾವಣಿಗ.
a village dweller; a countryman.
= ಗಾವುದ.
lacking wisdom; unintelligent.
a stupid, slow-witted person.
